nodes.text: Transgenic Sample Seven was the name given by Sannus Lorrick to a Reek that he infected with Rakghoul plague during his experiments on Ord Mantell. In 3639 BBY a strike team stormed Lorrick's lab and neutralized all threats within, including the Transgenic Sample Seven.
Transgenic Sample Seven appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss during the flashpoint "Lost Island".
